title: AI Agents
description: User-defined AI automation agents with persistent memory

confirm.pauseDesc: After pausing, the agent "{{name}}" will stop executing tasks automatically.
confirm.resumeDesc: After starting, the agent "{{name}}" will begin executing tasks automatically.

detail.selectAgent: Select an agent to view details

noAgentsDesc: Create your first AI agent to automate your IoT tasks
noExecutionsDesc: Execution history will appear here once the agent runs
createAgentDesc: Define a new AI agent with natural language
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this agent?
userPromptPlaceholder: Describe what this agent should do...
userPromptHint: Use natural language to describe the automation task. For example: 'Monitor the temperature sensor every 5 minutes and send an alert if it exceeds 30°C for 3 consecutive readings.'
cronHint: Format: minute hour day month weekday. Example: 0 * * * * for every hour
noDevices: No devices available. Add devices first.

execution.title: Execution Details
execution.description: Detailed view of agent execution process and results

memory.title: Agent Memory
memory.description: Persistent memory and learning state of the agent
memory.trendDataHint: {{count}} data points collected from device metrics
memory.clearMemoryConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear this agent's memory? This action cannot be undone.

userMessages.emptyHint: Send a message to provide additional context for this agent
userMessages.placeholder: Type a message to the agent...

basicInfo.name: Name
basicInfo.namePlaceholder: e.g., Warehouse Temperature Monitor, Equipment Anomaly Analysis
basicInfo.descriptionHint: Brief description of this agent's purpose (optional)
basicInfo.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Monitor warehouse environment, Analyze equipment energy trends
basicInfo.requirementHint: Describe the goals you want the agent to accomplish in natural language
basicInfo.requirementPlaceholder:
e.g.:
• Send alert when temperature exceeds 30°C
• Generate device status report at 9 AM daily
• Detect abnormal energy consumption and analyze causes
basicInfo.autoParseHint: The system will automatically parse your description and configure the execution logic
basicInfo.llmBackendHint: Select the LLM model for this agent. Uses the default model if not specified.

monitor.label: Monitor
monitor.description: Continuously monitor data changes, detect anomalies, and send alerts
monitor.template:
Please monitor the following data metrics and alert when anomalies are detected:

Monitoring Targets:
- Data Range:
- Anomaly Threshold:
- Alert Method:

Please analyze historical data to identify normal fluctuation ranges, and send alert notifications when data exceeds normal ranges.

control.label: Control
control.description: Automatically execute device control operations based on conditions
control.template:
Please automatically control devices based on the following conditions:

Trigger Conditions:
- Device Status:
- Data Threshold:

Execution Actions:
- Target Device:
- Control Command:

Please verify conditions before execution and avoid frequent repetitive operations.

analysis.label: Analysis
analysis.description: Periodically analyze data trends and generate reports
analysis.template:
Please periodically analyze the following data and generate reports:

Analysis Scope:
- Data Metrics:
- Time Range:

Report Contents:
1. Data trend analysis
2. Anomaly event records
3. Root cause analysis
4. Optimization recommendations

Please compare with historical data and provide valuable insights and action recommendations.

schedule.onceDescription: The agent will execute once immediately after saving, and will not trigger again automatically.

deviceOnline.title: Device Online Trigger
deviceOnline.description: Execute agent analysis immediately when device comes back online

deviceOffline.title: Device Offline Trigger
deviceOffline.description: Execute agent analysis immediately when device disconnects

metricAnomaly.title: Anomaly Detection Trigger
metricAnomaly.description: AI automatically detects data anomalies, supports custom thresholds

manual.title: Manual Trigger
manual.description: Only runs when manually clicking execute button, suitable for on-demand analysis

hint.interval: Will use last {{minutes}} minutes of data for trend analysis
hint.daily: Will use yesterday's full day data to generate daily report
hint.weekly: Will use past 7 days data to generate weekly report
hint.event: Will use latest data + historical baseline comparison

metricConfig.configureHint: Configure data strategy in main interface after selection

resources.title: Data Resources
resources.selectResource: Select a resource from the list
resources.selectResourceHint: Please select at least one data resource

dataCollection.title: Data Collection Config
dataCollection.hint: Configure data collection method for each metric. Different scenarios may require different configurations

validation.resourceRequired: Please select at least one device resource
